description: This file defines environment configuration management for a Flutter application, including loading environment variables from a .env file and exposing typed accessors for use elsewhere in the app.

classes.name: EnvKeys
classes.description: Contains static const keys used to access environment variables.

classes.name: EnvConfig
classes.description: Provides methods to load environment variables and retrieve them in a typed manner, ensuring environment variables are loaded only once.

methods.name: ensureLoaded
methods.description: Loads the .env file asynchronously if not already loaded.

methods.name: getString
methods.description: Retrieves a string environment variable, returning a default value if not set or empty.

methods.name: getBool
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean environment variable, interpreting common truthy strings.
